title: Sooooo....no skin for Shen, but Yi Gets Two Skins in One Year?

embed.description: VERY WIP!] [STATUS: PBE is currently offline.] The PBE has been updated! Today's update kicks off the 7.19 pbe cycle, including five new skins for Continue reading for more information! ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle!

body:
> Soaring Sword Fiora
> Sacred Sword Janna
> Eternal Sword Yi


...seriously? We're not only getting another Fiora skin, who's most recent skin was a little over a year ago, Yi, **who literally just received his cosmic skin in April this year**, and ... **Janna!?!?!?!** Janna is getting a skin, most likely having some sort of sword in it, even though she's more of a mage and uses a staff and relies on spells? 

I'm extremely upset by this right now! FFS RIOT YI JUST GOT A FUCKING SKIN THIS YEAR AND NOW YOU'RE GIVING HIM ANOTHER ONE?!?!?! Fiora I guess I can understand a bit but why Janna? Janna! Of all the characters she's getting thrown in with this sword theme? Why?!?!?!

I was getting hyped up for the Yorick skin for such a long time, even a bit more hyped to see if Shen would get a skin in so long since that chinese teaser was a perfect look of his sword. But now I'm just upset by there decisions with these skins! Like I said, Yi already got a skin this year, why is he getting the special treatment of getting two in the same year, in little over 6 months?!?!?! Fuck you Riot!
